cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Natural Resources on January 19, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1415, A bill to amend the Coastal Zone Management Act of 1972 to authorize grants to Indian Tribes to further achievement of Tribal coastal zone objectives, and for other purposes

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 37 (Friday, February 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KILMER:
H.R. 1415.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H859]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 405.

title: Tribal Coastal Resiliency Act
